snippet: Superior Court Judge Paul Ridgeway on Friday denied Duke Energy’s motion seeking to shield records in a civil suit related to groundwater pollution from 33 coal ash dumps in the state during a separate federal criminal investigation.
abstract: Superior Court Judge Paul Ridgeway denies Duke Energy’s motion seeking to shield records in a civil suit related to groundwater pollution from 33 coal ash dumps in North Carolina during a separate federal criminal investigation.
